title: Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead: Hai, Minotake ni Attemasu
original_name: これはゾンビですか? OF THE DEAD 「はい、身の丈に合ってます」
opening_song: "**_ Passionate (_**パショナート)" by Iori Nomizu
ending_song: "Koi no Beginner Nan Desu (T_T) (恋のビギナーなんです（T_T）)" by Rie Yamaguchi
sinopse: An unaired OVA episode of Kore wa Zombie Desu ka? of the Dead. It is the 11th episode and was bundled with the sixth volume of the manga.
